flavorText: Near the Krosan border, farmers keep watch over their fields lest the sod get up and wander away.

foreignData.flavorText: In der Nähe des Waldrandes von Krosa passen die Bauern auf ihre Felder auf, damit diese nicht aufstehen und davonwandern.
foreignData.name: Leben geben
foreignData.text:
Ein Land deiner Wahl wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer 3/3 Kreatur. Es ist immer noch ein Land.
Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: Cerca de la frontera krosana, los agricultores vigilan sus campos para que el césped no se levante y se vaya.
foreignData.name: Vivificar
foreignData.text:
La tierra objetivo es una criatura 3/3 hasta el final del turno. Sigue siendo una tierra.
Roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Près de la frontière de la Krosia, les fermiers surveillent leurs terres, par crainte qu'elles ne se lèvent et ne s'en aillent.
foreignData.name: Vivifaction
foreignData.text:
Le terrain ciblé devient une créature 3/3 jusqu'à la fin du tour. C'est toujours un terrain.
Piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: Vicino al confine di Krosa, i contadini sorvegliano i propri campi per evitare che si alzino e se ne vadano.
foreignData.name: Vivificare
foreignData.text:
La terra bersaglio diventa una creatura 3/3 fino alla fine del turno. È ancora una terra.
Pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Perto da fronteira de Krosa, os fazendeiros mantêm seus campos sob vigilância, temendo que a céspede se erga e se vá.
foreignData.name: Vivificar
foreignData.text:
O terreno alvo torna-se uma criatura 3/3 até o final do turno. Ela ainda conta como um terreno.
Compre um card.

name: Vivify
originalText:
Target land becomes a 3/3 creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

text:
Target land becomes a 3/3 creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
Draw a card.
